name: ROBO Mania
description:
ROBO Mania is a mini game collection game. complete multiple mini games to earn points to earn the highest score you can.

As you play and earn more points the timer speeds up to add challenge and fun to the game.

ROBO Mania is a mobile game. in order to install. download the file and put the APK on your phone from you PC or device. then install the APK onto your phone or tablet and enjoy.

Game Creator : Byron Andrews-Salvietto
